summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TruckerMaps - LKW Routenplaner. Backend APIs all working (15/15 tests passed). Frontend features verified: Login, Dashboard sidebar, Vehicle management with edit modal, Fahrtenbuch export buttons. Route Planner UI elements present but geocoding suggestions blocked by browser network restrictions.

integration_issues.issue: Nominatim API calls blocked by browser (net::ERR_FAILED). Location suggestions not appearing when typing city names.
integration_issues.note: Backend route calculation works correctly when coordinates are provided directly via API

passed_tests: Frontend: Login on Landing Page - WORKING
Frontend: Dashboard loads with driving stats - WORKING
Frontend: Hamburger menu opens sidebar - WORKING
Frontend: Sidebar shows Fahrzeuge, Fahrtenbuch, Lenkzeiten, Einstellungen - WORKING
Frontend: Fahrzeuge verwalten shows 4 vehicles - WORKING
Frontend: Vehicle edit modal (Fahrzeug bearbeiten) opens with all fields - WORKING
Frontend: Fahrtenbuch section with CSV/PDF export buttons - WORKING
Frontend: Route Planner shows Zwischenziel (0/7) button - WORKING
Frontend: Route Planner has voice input button (microphone icon) - WORKING
action_items: Consider adding a backend proxy for Nominatim geocoding to avoid browser CORS/network issues
Alternative: Use TomTom Search API (already have API key) for geocoding instead of Nominatim
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
TomTom API integration working correctly for route calculation
Vehicle edit modal has all required fields (Name, Höhe, Breite, Länge, Gewicht)
Fahrtenbuch export buttons have correct data-testid (export-csv-btn, export-pdf-btn)

success_rate.frontend: 90% (geocoding suggestions not working due to browser network restrictions)

seed_data_creation: Used existing test users and vehicles
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs tested and working. Frontend features verified except route calculation which requires geocoding fix. The /api/route/professional endpoint correctly returns 3 routes with waypoints support. Nominatim geocoding blocked in browser - consider using TomTom Search API as alternative.

features_verified.dashboard_sidebar: Working - Hamburger menu opens sidebar with all sections
features_verified.fahrzeuge_verwalten: Working - Shows 4 vehicles with Bearbeiten buttons
features_verified.fahrzeug_bearbeiten: Working - Edit modal with Name, Höhe, Breite, Länge, Gewicht fields
features_verified.fahrtenbuch_export: Working - CSV and PDF buttons visible (data-testid: export-csv-btn, export-pdf-btn)
features_verified.route_planner_ui: Working - Shows start/end inputs, Zwischenziel (0/7), voice input button
features_verified.route_professional_api: Working - Returns 3 routes with TomTom integration
features_verified.traffic_check_api: Working - Returns traffic status and alternative routes
features_verified.driving_logs_export_api: Working - CSV and PDF export endpoints functional

traffic_check.details: Returns has_better_route and traffic delay info

driving_logs_export_csv.details: Returns CSV file with driving log data
